website_summaries.verdict: The Totolink A2004NS AC1200 Wireless Dual Band Gigabit Router impresses far more with its features than it does with its performance, which was decidedly below average in our testing.

customer_reviews.title: Great speed with several QoS and Firewall settings
customer_reviews.text: My connection speed and range has improved significantly since upgrading my old Linksys WRT110 to this Totolink router. The instructions require some interpretations -and some of the prompts in the set up menu take some getting used to - but generally it is easy to set up - including the wireless security, QoS and Firewall options.
customer_reviews.author: 2020Shoper

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little router for an awesome price
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. The only problem that wasn't really a problem is that out of the box it was not set to English. I was able to fumble around and replace the firmware with an English version that I was able to download from the manufacturer's website and it worked like a champ.
customer_reviews.author: MrRedBeard

customer_reviews.title: So far so good and would have get 5 stars if the range ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good and would have get 5 stars if the range was a bit better but at this price, it is already very good as compared to some other brand/model that sell for much more. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Marko

customer_reviews.title: First week and it's too early to say something but for now it's working fine
customer_reviews.text: I have only one week of using this router and is working fine for me, it was hard to understand how WPS is working, but I get it :)...
customer_reviews.author: Westbuyer

customer_reviews.title: Decent wireless; no english firmware preinstalled.
customer_reviews.text: Non-english firmware. Was a little tricky getting the right firmware (english for me) installed. Product works okay. Lots of great features, but the wireless is a little lackluster.
customer_reviews.author: MrScruff

customer_reviews.title: Super easy setup!
customer_reviews.text: It works like it should, was easy to set up, steams videos without problems.
customer_reviews.author: parkranger

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: simple cheap and works not crazy w PPPTP constant pauses
customer_reviews.author: Coach T

customer_reviews.title: Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his totolink AC router and says it is fast? I would recommend this product. Easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Princess Fireworks

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for gaming or any other high speed needs. Easy setup.
customer_reviews.author: g

customer_reviews.title: GREAT ROUTER!
customer_reviews.text: On my 5 router and this blows them all out of the water!! Consistent speeds always! Very nice range and the quality seems as good as the bigger companies! I had a problem with the install disc but was easy to configure with the directions.
customer_reviews.author: robbyrobo

customer_reviews.title: Great if you can read Korean
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Router based off of reviews on CNET. When it arrived the instructions were in Korean.. which is fine I guess... or at least workable... I just downloaded the english version of the instructions online. When I logged into the router though, the firmware was ALSO in Korean. It didn't mention anything about it being a korean router anywhere on this page. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: ChrissMari

customer_reviews.title: Superior range, easy setup and competitive price.
customer_reviews.text: The Totolink router has 4 antennae that allow for omni-directional signal projection (great for multi-level homes) and excellent range (it worked from across the street!). Band-width exceeded that of my provider (~25Mbps down, ~10Mbps up). I logged into the router using the web-based setup page, selected the name, password and was running in less than 3 minutes. Instructions were intuitive and simple. So far reliability has been 100% with no resets required. Product comes with a three year warranty which is above average for routers. For the price, this product is an competitive newcomer in the home router world.
customer_reviews.author: bolson_CA

customer_reviews.title: Drops connection many times through out the day, MAC Authentication issues, VPN IS INSECURE DO NOT USE!
customer_reviews.text: Drops wifi connection many times through out the day. Another bug is If you add a MAC to authorized list and remove it, you have to add it to authorized again, even if you set it to accept all MAC. Tried new firmware, still same issues. Decent firewall/virus protection and logging with email ability. UPDATE: Turn off Net Detector in the routers web menu, and the signal drops happen less often . DO NOT USE THE BUILT IN VPN! IT USES ANCIENT MPPE ENCRYPTION WHICH IS INSECURE(128BIT RC4 MSCHAP). USE ANOTHER DEVICE WITH L2TP IPSEC (AES-256-GCM 4096 BIT)

product_meta.title: TOTOLINK A2004NS Gigabit AC 1200 Mbps Wireless/Ethernet WIFI Router, Dual Band w/ 3X Speed Boost, Guest Network
product_meta.description:
A2004NS is a Wireless AC Dual Band Gigabit Router which provides high performance network based on 802.11ac technology. It delivers wireless speed up to 1167Mbps and less interference for maximum throughput, which can enable high bandwidth-consuming applications like video streaming to be more smoothly. All gigabit ports and four high gain antennas ensure most stable and fast wired and wireless connection. The USB port makes file sharing easy and flexible. This is the best value in the market to finally take advantage of your Internet Service providers speeds. Built to work flawlessly with Google Fiber users.

AMAZON.COM
feature_bullets: Simultaneous dual-band speed up to 300 Mbps (2.4 GHz) + 867 Mbps (5 GHz)
Four pieces high gain antennas for wider WiFi coverage
Multiple Wireless Network for Access Control
